about_the_game:
Snake + Vampire Surviror

- "Dracula’s Vengeance" is an innovative snake + vampire survivor game. In the game, you will play Dacura - an old vampire hunted down by modern demon hunters. Your goal is to Retake your castle and destroy all enemies who dare to challenge you.
- The game uses a cartoon-style screen. You need to move on the map, kill monsters, and summon the servants who follow you. The minions will automatically attack enemies, but be careful, if you run into them, something very bad will happen. . .
- The game has a variety of modes and levels to choose from, and each mode has different rules and challenges. You can enjoy the fun of Snake + Vampire Survivor in Classic Mode; or challenge yourself to see how long you can last in Survival Mode.
- "Dracula’s Vengeance" is a game suitable for players of all ages and preferences, whether you want to experience the thrill of violent output, or looking for a relaxing and fun casual game to pass the time, this game Can satisfy you. Come join Dracula and his lovable and deadly minions!
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

Join our and talk with us now!


About the Game

Snake + Vampire Surviror

- "Dracula’s Vengeance" is an innovative snake + vampire survivor game. In the game, you will play Dacura - an old vampire hunted down by modern demon hunters. Your goal is to Retake your castle and destroy all enemies who dare to challenge you.
- The game uses a cartoon-style screen. You need to move on the map, kill monsters, and summon the servants who follow you. The minions will automatically attack enemies, but be careful, if you run into them, something very bad will happen. . .
- The game has a variety of modes and levels to choose from, and each mode has different rules and challenges. You can enjoy the fun of Snake + Vampire Survivor in Classic Mode; or challenge yourself to see how long you can last in Survival Mode.
- "Dracula’s Vengeance" is a game suitable for players of all ages and preferences, whether you want to experience the thrill of violent output, or looking for a relaxing and fun casual game to pass the time, this game Can satisfy you. Come join Dracula and his lovable and deadly minions!
name: Dracula’s Vengeance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1以上
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Simple and refreshing casual action game!
